author: mbautin
msg: Summary: The region server currently lists all the region servers that it is hosting. It will be useful to report when those regions were opened on this server. It will also be useful to report what and when were the recent regions closed.
create table test1, test2, test3, test4. disable these tables, then enable them. then you will see a list of recently closed regions info and the open date of those regions.
there will be an error for org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.TestFSErrorsExposed

author: sergeyb
msg: [CXF-4373] Updating JAXB providers to end the xml documents only on JAX-RS paths

author: scottbw
msg: Removed access to preference directly from persistence manager as a query, replaced with simple call to widgetInstance.getPreferences()
